overview: You lose, you give up your ass at "The Cockpit Club", the underground wrestling club where the challenger puts his hole on the line. Six sizzling sex scenes lead up to the ultimate grudge match banger. HOT and horny studs suck, lick and fuck their way through the competition. Featuring a three-way with Kyle Bradford, Sonny Markham, and Tommy Saxx.
tagline: Kyle Bradford in his first xxx rated movie!
title: The Cockpit Club
